Grid Module

The grid module provides spectral grid classes for 1D, 2D, and 3D simulations.

Grid1D

class phrike.grid.Grid1D(N: int, Lx: float, dealias: bool = True, filter_params: Dict[str, float] | None = None, fft_workers: int = 1, backend: str = 'numpy', torch_device: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Uniform periodic 1D grid and spectral operators.

N

Number of spatial points.

Type:

int

Lx

Domain length.

Type:

float

dealias

If True, apply 2/3-rule dealiasing mask in spectral space.

Type:

bool

filter_params

Optional exponential filter configuration with keys: - enabled: bool - p: even integer (>= 2) - alpha: filter strength

Type:

Optional[Dict[str, float]]

N: int
Lx: float
dealias: bool = True
filter_params: Dict[str, float] | None = None
fft_workers: int = 1
backend: str = 'numpy'
torch_device: str | None = None
rfft(f: ndarray) → ndarray[source]
irfft(F: ndarray) → ndarray[source]
dx1(f: ndarray) → ndarray[source]
apply_spectral_filter(f: ndarray) → ndarray[source]
convolve(f: ndarray, g: ndarray) → ndarray[source]

Compute product in physical space, with dealiased spectral filtering.

For pseudo-spectral nonlinearity, compute pointwise product then apply dealiasing/filter on the spectral representation.

__init__(N: int, Lx: float, dealias: bool = True, filter_params: Dict[str, float] | None = None, fft_workers: int = 1, backend: str = 'numpy', torch_device: str | None = None) → None

Grid2D

class phrike.grid.Grid2D(Nx: int, Ny: int, Lx: float, Ly: float, dealias: bool = True, filter_params: Dict[str, float] | None = None, fft_workers: int = 1, backend: str = 'numpy', torch_device: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Uniform periodic 2D grid and spectral operators.

The last two axes are spatial: (…, Ny, Nx)

Grid3D

class phrike.grid.Grid3D(Nx: int, Ny: int, Nz: int, Lx: float, Ly: float, Lz: float, dealias: bool = True, filter_params: Dict[str, float] | None = None, fft_workers: int = 1, backend: str = 'numpy', torch_device: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Uniform periodic 3D grid and spectral operators.

The last three axes are spatial: (…, Nz, Ny, Nx)

Filter Functions

The module includes functions for building spectral filters:

phrike.grid._build_exponential_filter(N: int, p: int, alpha: float) → ndarray[source]

phrike.grid._build_filter_mask_3d(Nx: int, Ny: int, Nz: int, dealias: bool) → ndarray[source]
phrike.grid._build_exponential_filter_3d(Nx: int, Ny: int, Nz: int, p: int, alpha: float) → ndarray[source]
